formula.name: Burning Ship
formula.reference: Xrn = (Xr2 - 3 * Xi2) * abs(Xr) + Cr; Xin = (3 * Xr2 - Xi2) * abs(Xi) + Ci;
formula.perturbation: xrn = (Xr2 - 3 * Xi2) * diffabs(Xr, xr) + (2 * Xr * xr + xr2 - 6 * Xi * xi - 3 * xi2) * abs(Xr + xr) + cr; xin = (3 * Xr2 - Xi2) * diffabs(Xi, xi) + (6 * Xr * xr + 3 * xr2 - 2 * Xi * xi - xi2) * abs(Xi + xi) + ci;
